DATA_DESCRIPTION.id: A unique identifier value for the entry.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.utc_time: A timestamp (in UTC+0) of when the data was recorded.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.utc_offset: The timezone offset, in hours, of the system at recording.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.device_name: The name of the vent device that the entry was recorded from.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.device_address: The MAC address of the vent device that the entry was recorded from.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.device_rssi: The singal strength between the hub and vent unit on last connect.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.vent_closed: A true/false indicating if the vent is closed at time of recording.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.temperature: A temperature measurement of the vent device.
DATA_DESCRIPTION.humidity: A humidity measurement of the vent device.
